document.full_text: the minnesota vikings football team would get a new stadium built at the same location as the current metrodome under a proposed $895 million plan announced by the city of minneapolis on monday.
document.title: minneapolis proposes $895 million vikings stadium plan
lines_and_colors: the minnesota vikings football team would get a new stadium built at the same location as the current metrodome under a proposed $895 million plan announced by the city of minneapolis on monday.
